caption.p:
Fluctuation functions (solid) for CMIP5 AR5 models. The respective crossover time scales present are ( a) member 1: 15 days, 328 days, 760 days (stars); member 2: 15 days, 332 days, 768 days (diamonds); ( b) member 1: 15 days, 82 days, 357 days, 708 days (stars); member 2: 15 days, 82 days, 357 days, 710 days (diamonds); ( c) member 1: 15 days, 79 days, 373 days (stars); member 2: 15 days, 79 days, 346 days, 889 days (diamonds); ( d) 64 days, 332 days, 690 days (stars); ( e) 67 days, 322 days, 652 days (stars); ( f) member 1: 9 days, 39 days, 410 days, 7.9 years (stars); member 2: 11 days, 47 days, 4.5 years (diamonds). The dashed line (orange) denotes a slope of
. (Online version in colour.)
